name: Trials Of War
description:
Trials of war is a strategy game to collect 7 PRECIOUS GEM STONES. If you collect ALL 7 you WIN THE WAR. Collect weapons, treasure hunt, MASSIVE NPC BATTLES. A OPEN WORLD TO EXPLORE.


HAPPY HALLOWEEN. TODAY I WILL BE RELEASING MY RPG TRIALS OF WAR. THANK YOU TO ALL MY SUPPORTERS ON TIKTOK FOR HELPING ME PUSH THIS APPLICATION. AS A BONUS HERE IS A HALLOWEN ANIMATION I MADE FEATURING GHOSTBUSTERS AND SOME FAMILIAR FACES. THE DOWNLOAD WILL BE FREE AT 2 PM EST USA TIME. PLEASE HELP SUPPORT THIS PROJECT.  ALSO PLEASE SUBSCRIBE AND HAVE A SAFE HALLOWEEN.
